title: Event Management System
description: A full-stack Event Management System built with user authentication and role-based access.Users can register, log in, and explore upcoming events.Admins have access to a dedicated panel to manage all events.Includes full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality for event listings.Built with a modern tech stack for a responsive and intuitive user experience..

title: Bell Project
description: The Bell Project is a web-based application designed to automate and manage institutional bell scheduling. It allows admins to set custom bell timings for different periods (e.g., lectures, breaks, exams) and plays a bell sound at the configured times. Built using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend, this project showcases real-time clock management, timer logic, and an easy-to-use admin interface.
